title: GUILTY.GEAR.Xrd.SIGN-CODEX
description:
C O D E X
P R E S E N T S

GUILTY GEAR Xrd -SIGN- (c) Arc System Works

Release Date :  12/2015              Protection : Steam
Discs        :  1                    Genre      : Action

Revolutionary graphics, Overwhelming battle system! Carrying on the
legacy from 1998, comes the newest addition to  the  "Guilty  Gear"
series! All visuals, especially the characters, have  been  redrawn
in full 3D, tweaked to the finest detail and hand-polished  by  the
animation  masters  to produce  the top  quality  hand-drawn  anime
effect!

For more info go to : http://store.steampowered.com/app/376300/

- Extract
- Burn or mount the .iso
- Run setup.exe and install
- Copy crack from CODEX dir to installdir
- Play

Notes: run the game either from created shortcut or BootGGXrd.bat,
located in game's installdir.

General Notes:

- Block the game's exe in your firewall to prevent the game from
trying to go online ..
- If you install games to your systemdrive, it may be necessary
to run this game with admin privileges instead
